code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await login(username,password);document.location.href='/';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]});};export default Login;
